remarks: The factors of ~ ablfac1b are of prime power order.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)

ablfac1a $p |- ( ( ph /\ P e. A ) -> ( # ` ( S ` P ) ) = ( P ^ ( P pCnt ( # ` B ) ) ) ) $.
